description: Variation of conditions 2 (drawing numbers), 3 (number of sump pumps) and 8 (damp membrane to lower ground floor slab) pursuant to listed building consent dated 25/04/2023 ref 2022/4756 (Alterations including erection of a two storey extension  between Hollywood building and its coach-house; internal and external alterations to the listed buildings to include removal of internal walls, installation of lifts, installation of partitions and works to windows; removal of Early Years Lodge; alterations to kitchen extraction; installation of cycle parking and refuse and recycling stores; and general property maintenance. (Associated planning application ref. 2022/4873) to allow retention of Lower Ground Floor rooms, revision to sump pumps and revision to damp proofing.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The work to which this consent relates shall be begun not later than three years from the date of the initial consent ref: 2022/4756 (dated: 25 April 2023). 
Reason: To comply with the requirements of Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 and the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015.
Condition : 2 - The works hereby authorised shall be carried out in complete accordance with the following plans and specifications: [PD0001; PD0003; T1000 (Rev A); PD1001 (Rev B); T1002 (Rev B); PD1100 Rev A; PD1101; PD1102; PD1103; PD1310 (Rev A); PD1311 (Rev A); PD1312 (Rev A); PD1313 (Rev A); PD1240 (Rev A); PD1241 (Rev A); PD1242 (Rev A); PD1243 (Rev A); PD1244 (Rev A); PD1245 (Rev A); PD1400 Rev A; PD1401; PD1402; PD1403; PD1604; PD1614; PD1620; PD1621; PD1622; PD1623; PD1624; PD2001; PD2002; PD2003; PD2004; PD2005; PD2006; PD2007; PD2008; PD-3001; PD-3002; PD-3003; PD-3004; PD-3005; PD-3006; PD3110; PD6001; 2273/1991 C2; 2273/1992 C5; 2273/1993 C3; 2273/1001 T2; 2273/1002 T4; 2273/1003 T2; 2273/1011 T1; 2273/1012 T3; 2273/1013 T3; 2273/1021 T1; 2273/1022 T4; 2273/1031 T1; 2273/1032 T4; 2273/2001 T3; 2273/2002 T1; 2273/2003 T1; 2273/2004 T1; 2273/3001 T3; 2273/7001 T1; 2273/7002 T1; 2273/7003 T1; 2273/8001 T1; 2273/8002 T1; T1222 (Rev A); T1242 (Rev A); T2500; T3001;T3002 (Sketched, received 01.03.2023); Partition Sketch (Icklesham Joinery Ltd); T3004; T3500; T3501; T3504; T3550; T4000; T4003; T4106; T4200; MXF-XX-02-DR-P-12100 (Rev P03); 230227-AK-SK01; 230227-AK-SK02 (Rev A); 230227-AK-SK03; 230227-AK-SK04; 230227-AK-SK05; 230227-AKSK06; 230227-AK-SK07; CD0999; CD1091; CD1092; CD1090; Method Statement (Removal of existing lower ground floor slabs and introduction of a damp proof membrane, dated 10/11/2023); Revised damp-proofing proposals to London Park School (10.11.2023); Asbestos Survey prepared by Frankham RMS (ref. J026334, dated 11/07/2022); Condition Assessment Report prepared by Stonewest (ref. 67873, dated December 2022); Design and Access Statement prepared by Walters and Cohen Architects (dated November 2022); Fire Strategy prepared by the Fire Surgery (dated 16/11/2022); Historic Environment Assessment prepared by LUC (dated November 2022); Intervention Schedule prepared by LUC (ref. 2206-14.2); Quotation prepared by Cemplas (dated 05/02/2023); Alternative Quota
Condition : 3 - The location and number of sump pumps and damp proofing strategy shall be carried out in accordance with the approved drawings and details [2273/1991 C2, 2273/1992 C5, 2273/1993 C3, CD0999, CD1091, CD1092, CD1090, Method Statement (Removal of existing lower ground floor slabs and introduction of a damp proof membrane, dated 10/11/2023), Revised damp-proofing proposals to London Park School (10.11.2023)]. 
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).
Condition : 4 - Prior to specific works detailed, updated M&E drawings for the buildings showing the proposed new notches/holes needed to the joists shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. 
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).

Condition : 5 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the detailed method statement for the formation of door and glazed partition in hallway of Broadoak approved under details application ref: 2023/2458 
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).

Condition : 6 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the detailed method statement for the formation of the door opening in the side wall of the ground floor room in Hollywood, approved under details application ref: 2023/2459.
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).
Condition : 7 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the detailed method statement for the rebuilding of the side wall of the west wing of Hollywood, approved under details application ref: 2023/2457.
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).
Condition : 8 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the detailed method statement  and details hereby approved [2273/1991 C2, 2273/1992 C5, 2273/1993 C3, CD0999, CD1091, CD1092, CD1090, Method Statement (Removal of existing lower ground floor slabs and introduction of a damp proof membrane, dated 10/11/2023), Revised damp-proofing proposals to London Park School (10.11.2023)] for the removal of lower ground floor slab and introduction of damp membrane.
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).
Condition : 9 - Notwithstanding submitted information, prior to specific works a detailed schedule of repairs for the interior of the buildings shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. 
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).

Condition : 10 - Notwithstanding submitted information, prior to specific works the submitted schedule of repairs for the exterior should be updated to include details and specification of materials such as the render. This shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. 
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).
Condition : 11 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the sample of brick to be used in the re-building of the side wall of the west wing of Hollywood, approved under details application ref: 2023/3566. 
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).
Condition : 12 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the detailed drawings of all new and replacement doors approved under details application ref: 2023/2461. 
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).
Condition : 13 - Notwithstanding submitted information, prior to specific works detailed drawings of typical new and replacement windows including sections through the frame and glazing bars shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority. All replacement windows should be slimline glazing with integrated glazing bars. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. 
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).
Condition : 14 - 
Notwithstanding submitted information, prior to specific works detailed drawings of the replacement louvres shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy LP3 of the Local Plan (2023).
Condition : 15 - INFORMATIVE: In dealing with this application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive manner and the Council has, as far as practicable, sought solutions to problems arising in relation to dealing with the planning application. The Council has made available detailed advice in the form of its statutory policies in the Local Plan (2023) as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably. In addition, where appropriate, further guidance was offered to the applicant during the processing of the application.
